title: Task 75

question.text: What seems to be the mix-up Bob talks about?

answers.answer: He imagined that Maria liked chicken wings like him
answers.feedback: The discussion is not about their likes or dislikes, but the amount of food to the party.

answers.answer: He thought each chicken cost 20 pounds instead of 10
answers.feedback: Pounds, here, does not refer to the UK currency, but to weight.

answers.answer: He believed Maria was a vegetarian and did not want chicken meat to be served at the party
answers.feedback: It's a company party, so they might have to tend to people with different dietary habits, not only vegetarians.

answers.answer: He thought that they had the same idea about the amount of chicken wings that would be served at the party.

description:
Pounds are a unit of weight used to measure how heavy something is. For example, if a bag of apples weighs 2 pounds (for those who use the metric system, approximately 1 kilogram), it means the apples are as heavy as that.

Chicken wings are a type of food made from the wings of a chicken. They are often cooked and eaten as a snack or meal, sometimes with sauce or seasoning.

To agree on something means that two or more people share the same opinion or decision about a specific thing. For example, if you and your friend both decide to go to the movies, you can say I agree on going to the movies to tell your friend you like the plan or idea.
